snippet.title: Kingdom Bash - Wishlist Now! Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam! https://www.kingdombash.com/steam
I've started Kingdom Bash development up again!

Kingdom Bash® is a fresh take on classic friendship-ruining party multiplayer action, in development for PC. Developed as a love letter to classic games, with the intention of bringing back couch multiplayer. Throw a party and encourage friends as they demolish each other in fast-paced multiplayer. Designed to be easy to learn, yet hard to master. Choose your powers and use the environment around you to defeat your opponents. Enjoy authentic retro sights and sounds as you explore a fantasy world, making friends in cooperative play, or ruin friendships in competitive modes.

Kingdom Bash:
Itch.io ► https://mattyalanestock.itch.io/kingdombash
Website ► https://www.kingdombash.com/
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/kingdombash/
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/kingdombash
Instagram ► https://instagram.com/kingdombash

The short, beardy developer:
Website ► https://www.matthewestock.com/
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/mattyalanestock/
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/mattyalanestock

#kingdombash #Indiegame #solodev
